name: Firefox | Loading Throbber Nr. 2 (Chrome Black)
description:
Makes your Firefox loading Throbber looking like Chrome (Chromium) in black!

LAST CHANGE:
2010-04-11 MAIK LINDNER

Animated Trobber was created by myself using:
Adobe Illustrator,
Adobe Photoshop and
JapngEditor (http://www.reto-hoehener.ch/japng/apng_editor.html)
